description: This file defines a utility object StringUtils that provides static methods for joining a linked list into a string and splitting a string into a linked list, utilizing external utility classes JoinUtils and SplitUtils.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A utility singleton object offering static methods for string and linked list manipulation.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String using JoinUtils.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList using SplitUtils.
